data.title: In other people news
data.meta_description: IN OTHER PEOPLE NEWS ... \n Telluride Ski Resort will name a ski trail after Teddy Ebersol, the 14-year-old son of NBC Sports executive Dick Ebersol and actress Susan Saint James. The teen was killed â€¦
data.text:
IN OTHER PEOPLE NEWS ...

Telluride Ski Resort will name a ski trail after Teddy Ebersol, the 14-year-old son of NBC Sports executive Dick Ebersol and actress Susan Saint James. The teen was killed in a plane crash in November.

"Teddy's Way" will be dedicated in a public ceremony Saturday, and Ebersol and Saint James are expected to attend, resort spokeswoman Mary Helyn Kirwan said.

The couple own a home in Telluride and are active in the community.

Teddy Ebersol died Nov. 28 when a chartered plane crashed during takeoff in light snow and freezing temperatures from the airport in nearby Montrose. Dick Ebersol, another son and a co-pilot were injured.
